games.title: Drakkar Strike
games.description: Sail the seas on your drakkar, launch spears like a furious slingshot, and crush enemy vikings before they sink you!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag to aim your spear & Release to launch.

Hit enemy vikings and sink their ships.
Clear all foes to win!

games.title: The Pirate Sea. The Smuggler's Way
games.description:
In the game you have to take on the role of a smuggler.

Search for treasures, complete various tasks, destroy enemy ships, capture islands, upgrade your ship, beware of sea monsters and become the most famous smuggler.
games.howToPlayText:
PC Management:

Up arrow - Straight movement
Down arrow - Backward movement
Right Arrow - Move to the right
Left Arrow - Move to the left

Key "D" -  Shooting from the right side.
Key "A" - Shooting from the left side.
Left Shift - Acceleration

Management for Mobile devices:

Up arrow button - Straight movement
The down arrow button is a backward movement.
Left arrow button - Move to the left
Right arrow button - Move to the right
A button with a burning shell on the left - Shooting from the left side
A button with a burning shell on the right - Shooting from the starboard side
Red-and-white arrow button - Acceleration

For accelerated swimming, you need food, it is spent while swimming in the sea.

To set the course, open the map and click on the compass icon near the desired location.

The leaderboard shows the amount of your gold.

games.title: Solitaire Klondike - Treasure Island
games.description: Dive into the exciting adventure of Solitaire Klondike - Treasure Island, where pirates and treasures await. Help a brave heroine uncover her father''s hidden fortune while outsmarting relentless foes, all set against stunning visuals and captivating animations.
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to arrange all the cards into four piles according to suit: from Ace to King. Start with aces, then twos, threes, and so on until you reach the king.

On the game board, you can move cards between seven piles. You can only start a new pile with a king. You can place a card of a different color and one unit of lower value on a card in the stack. Groups of cards with alternating colors and ranks can be dragged between stacks, adding tactical depth.

You can review the deck an unlimited number of times, giving you the opportunity to carefully consider each move. The game ends when all the cards are neatly placed in piles.

Test your skills in this exciting solitaire card game and enjoy every victory!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/solitaire-klondike-treasure-island?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>
